<a href="https://store.hermanmiller.com/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=newsletter&utm_content=11132020" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Herman Miller" style="width:100%;max-width: 171px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="171" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL2NvbXBhbnkvbG9nby8yNi8xNjAyMDE1Njc3LWhlcm1hbi1taWxsZXItdmVjdG9yLWxvZ28ucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0IjoiY29tZXQtbW9ybmluZ2JyZXciLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ=="></a>
</th>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Good morning and Happy Friday the 13th. If you’re feeling superstitious today, you aren't alone. We asked around the virtual office to find out our colleagues’ most bizarre superstitions.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Becky, intern: </strong></span><span>“Whenever I take an exam I need to wear a long sleeve shirt and have at least 3 pencils”</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Isaac, account manager: </strong></span><span>“I won’t take my phone off airplane mode until we’re stopped.”</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Henry, copywriter:</strong></span><span> “I always make sure my hands are greased with Hellmann's mayonnaise before milking a cow.”</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Stay vigilant today.</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>
</table>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PUBLIC HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/12/powell-rising-us-covid-cases-threaten-economic-recovery?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Storm Before the Calm
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Lines of cars wrap around LA's Dodger Stadium parking lot for Covid-19 testing. The LA skyline and sunset are visible in the background." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTE0L2NvdmlkLTE5X2RvZGdlcl9zdGFkaXVtLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Cars line up for Covid-19 testing at LA's Dodger Stadium. | Robert Gauthier via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Still riding high from Monday's vaccine news? Don't get too ahead of yourself, because "with the virus now spreading, the next few months could be challenging," Fed Chair Jerome Powell <a href="https://money.usnews.com/investing/news/articles/2020-11-12/fed-chair-powell-says-next-months-could-be-challenging#:~:text=WASHINGTON%20(Reuters)%20%2D%20The%20rising,disease%20continues%20to%20spread%20unchecked.?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">warned</a> at a European Central Bank event yesterday.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">There have been positive updates: Yesterday, we learned that jobless claims <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/weekly-jobless-claims-coronavirus-11-12-2020-11605125188?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">were down</a> for the fourth straight week to 709,000, and unemployment fell to 6.9% in October—signs that workers are being called back or finding new roles. And Pfizer's big vaccine reveal (90% effectiveness in late-stage clinical trials) was a <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/pfizers-vaccine-is-a-pick-me-up-for-value-stocks-11605175592?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">boon for value stocks</a> and industries hit hard by the pandemic, like travel.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0"><strong style="color:#000">But first, we gotta deal with this</strong></h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">New cases and hospitalizations have risen in almost all 50 states, and Texas just became the first to pass 1 million confirmed cases.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Parts of the economy are steadily recovering, but as a growing number of state and local governments reimpose restrictions on business activity and social life, "people may lose confidence that it is safe to go out," Powell said.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Yesterday, Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot </span><span><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/chicago-covid-coronavirus-mayor-lori-lightfoot-testing/7889268/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">asked</a></span><span> residents to go virtual this Thanksgiving and only venture out for essential needs. NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio </span><span><a href="https://www.nbcnewyork.com/news/coronavirus/new-restrictions-take-effect-in-nj-as-covid-19-cases-surge-cuomo-tightens-rules-in-ny/2718429/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a></span><span> if the positivity rate reaches 3%, schools will go remote.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>In Europe, several governments have reinstituted lockdowns. Early data in Germany, France, Belgium, and Spain shows they're </span><span><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/nov/12/global-report-lockdowns-start-to-limit-covid-19-spread-in-europe?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reducing transmission</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Flattening the curve is made even harder by widespread <a href="https://www.gzeromedia.com/a-snapshot-of-covid-19-a-year-on?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pandemic fatigue</a>. Many people are reluctant to go through lockdowns again and are relaxing health safeguards, GZERO Media writes. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Can a vaccine fix things?  </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">"Certainly it's not going to be a pandemic for a lot longer, because I believe the vaccines are going to turn that around," Dr. Anthony Fauci said this week. In addition to Pfizer's big update, Moderna <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/11/12/coronavirus-moderna-vaccine-data-is-coming-in-days-what-to-look-out-for.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">is expected</a> to post good news about its mRNA vaccine in the coming days. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But...it could still take weeks to get approval and months to manufacture and distribute it. And even longer to inoculate most of the population. In the meantime, health officials are stressing the continued need to wear masks and social distance.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
POLLING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/12/get-used-americans-embrace-remote-work-per-exclusive-morning-brew-polling?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Remote Work: Less Traffic, More Fiber
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Home office" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC85MzMvaG9tZV9vZmZpY2UuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This year's social distancing mandates have made employees much more familiar with each other's living rooms. But according to a poll shared exclusively with Morning Brew, they've also helped us turn our own lifestyle knobs to "Healthy." </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">A Morning Brew/Harris poll conducted last weekend found that…</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Two-thirds (67%) of remote workers say their lifestyle has gotten healthier since working from home. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>About two in five remote workers (41%) say that since working from home, they've been eating healthier snacks throughout the day. About the same amount (38%) say they've been taking time to cook their meals. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Plus, U.S. remote workers are enjoying a more flexible routine. The top three things employed Americans said they'd miss about working remotely, if they had to return to an office, were: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Saving money by spending less on on gas and lunches each week (41%) </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Extra time in the mornings (40%) </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Being at home with their family (39%) </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>While convenient for those who can partake, remote work isn't available to everyone. Deutsche Bank Research released a report yesterday <a href="https://www.bbc.com/news/business-54876526?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">recommending a tax</a> on remote employers to support those who can't work from home.</p>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
RESTAURANT
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/12/chipotle-debuts-first-ghost-kitchen?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Bad News if You Love Telling Strangers Which Beans to Scoop
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="A Chipotle burrito and a storefront on top of a smartphone " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTEyL2NoaXBvdGxlX2J1cnJpdG9fYW5kX3N0b3JlLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Chipotle's first "ghost kitchen," announced on Wednesday, <a href="https://www.restaurantbusinessonline.com/operations/chipotle-rolls-out-its-first-ghost-kitchen?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">opens tomorrow</a> in Highland Falls, NY. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What's a ghost kitchen? </strong>A food prep location that <em>only</em> operates for delivery—no ordering on premises. Chipotle's version offers pickup as well. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">How it works:</strong> Customers place orders on Chipotle's website, app, or a third-party delivery platform. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>Covid-19 has been devastating the restaurant biz. With the industry expected to lose $240 billion in sales by the end of 2020, pivoting to digital delivery and pickup with ghost kitchens could be a lifeboat for struggling chains. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>In Q3, Chipotle's digital sales soared over 200% yearly to $776 million. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Another benefit of ghost kitchens? They give operators like Chipotle more flexibility to enter urban areas where full-size restaurants are tougher to squeeze in. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>as Covid cases in the U.S. climb past records, restaurants are bracing for another round of restrictions on in-person dining. </p>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2020%2F11%2F12%2Fchipotle-debuts-first-ghost-kitchen" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">

</h3>

</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Forget gifting everyone a mug with your face on it or painting a watercolor of the family dog for your parents.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This year, you’re going to win the holidays with some help from the delightful design experts, <a href="https://store.hermanmiller.com/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=newsletter&utm_content=11132020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Herman Miller</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">You see, everyone loves a good seat, and Herman Miller makes the best of ‘em. Take their iconic office chair, <a href="https://store.hermanmiller.com/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=newsletter&utm_content=11132020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Aeron</a>, for example.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It’s always the talk of “best office chair” lists, plus it’s super ergonomic so you can get away with drinking eggnog and still feel pretty dang healthy about things.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Every chair by <a href="https://store.hermanmiller.com/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=newsletter&utm_content=11132020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Herman Miller</a> is of the highest quality: crafted with care, built to last, and backed by a 12-year warranty.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Plus, they’re having a holiday sale where you can <strong style="color:#000">get 15% off and free shipping</strong> until December 1.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://store.hermanmiller.com/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=newsletter&utm_content=11132020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">We'll <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">cheers</span> chairs to that</a>. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
IPO
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/12/next-wave-ipos-includes-doordash-airbnb?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The IPOs Are Coming
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Jon Snow " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/3ohzdUi5U8LBb4GD4s/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Jon Snow " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/3ohzdUi5U8LBb4GD4s/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Airbnb, DoorDash, Roblox, and Wish are all aiming to go public between Thanksgiving and New Year's, <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/11/12/airbnb-doordash-wish-roblox-ipos-all-expected-before-year-end.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reports CNBC</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>As bad as this year has been for procuring dumbbells, it's been quite hospitable to companies going public. In the last wave of IPOs this fall, hyped tech companies Snowflake, Unity, Asana, and Palantir raised billions to capitalize on 2020's embrace of all things digital.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">So who's in the newest IPO class? <strong style="color:#000"></strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Wish </strong></span><span>is an e-commerce app that sells </span><span><a href="https://techcrunch.com/2020/09/01/what-will-a-wish-ipo-look-like-seems-well-find-out-sooner-than-later/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">ridiculously cheap items</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Airbnb </strong></span><span>is the home rental giant that managed to survive the pandemic. It would be one of the </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-11-10/airbnb-is-said-to-push-back-ipo-filing-to-avoid-election-overlap?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">biggest U.S. IPOs</a></span><span> of the year.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Roblox </strong></span><span>is the incredibly popular </span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/10/12/roblox-confidentially-files-go-public?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">gaming platform</a></span><span> that your kid is probably using instead of doing her homework.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">DoorDash </strong></span><span>is a food delivery company that scored a </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/11/05/california-prop-22-win-improves-doordash-instacart-ipo-prospects.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">big policy win</a></span><span> last week when Prop 22 passed in California. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the companies are expected to make their IPO filings public by next week, so prepare yourself for some Mel Kiper-esque financial scouting.</p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FROM THE CREW
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
How to Run Your Own Zoom Trivia Night
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

</table>
<img alt="Trivia night by morning brew" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTA4L3RyaXZpYV9uaWdodF9ieV9tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">With a long pandemic winter approaching, you're going to need entertainment options other than Saturday night at Trader Joe's.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Morning Brew to the rescue </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Considering a) we do trivia every day in the newsletter and b) existing Zoom trivia is not good, we decided to create your <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/03/run-zoom-trivia-night?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">all-in-one kit</a> for hosting virtual trivia with family, friends, or coworkers. What will you find?</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Six rounds of fun, challenging-but-not-too-challenging questions</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Blank team sheets</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>An answer sheet with...answers</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Instructions so simple you barely have to think. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The best part? It only takes about an hour, so you can get back to grocery shopping.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/03/run-zoom-trivia-night?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Learn how to run virtual Trivia Night here</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"> </p>

<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">98. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The pattern is (first number) * (first number + second number - 1).</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">So for 2+3=8 ... 2*(5-1) = 8</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">For 7+8 = 98 ... 7*(15-1) = 98</p>

href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy-budget/u-s-starts-fiscal-2021-with-111-jump-in-october-deficit-idUSKBN27S2XH?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" In October, the U.S. posted a budget deficit of $284 billion, an 111% increase over last year. The rise can be linked to increased spending for Covid-19 but less tax revenue.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eMarkets: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eStocks \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/11/11/stock-market-futures-open-to-close-news.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edrooped\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e as rising new Covid cases threaten to stall the economic recovery. Bitcoin, on the other hand, passed $16,000. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c/th\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!-- END MARKETS --\u003e\n\u003c!-- ARTICLE ---\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"c6 \" style=\"margin-bottom:7px\"\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003cth class=\"card\" style=\"text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px\"\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding: 15px;\"\u003e\n\u003ch3 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0\"\u003e\nPUBLIC HEALTH\n\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003ch1 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/12/powell-rising-us-covid-cases-threaten-economic-recovery?email={{profile.email}}\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nThe Storm Before the Calm\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Lines of cars wrap around LA's Dodger Stadium parking lot for Covid-19 testing. The LA skyline and sunset are visible in the background.\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTE0L2NvdmlkLTE5X2RvZGdlcl9zdGFkaXVtLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eCars line up for Covid-19 testing at LA's Dodger Stadium. | Robert Gauthier via Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eStill riding high from Monday's vaccine news? Don't get too ahead of yourself, because \"with the virus now spreading, the next few months could be challenging,\" Fed Chair Jerome Powell \u003ca href=\"https://money.usnews.com/investing/news/articles/2020-11-12/fed-chair-powell-says-next-months-could-be-challenging#:~:text=WASHINGTON%20(Reuters)%20%2D%20The%20rising,disease%20continues%20to%20spread%20unchecked.?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewarned\u003c/a\u003e at a European Central Bank event yesterday.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThere have been positive updates: Yesterday, we learned that jobless claims \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/weekly-jobless-claims-coronavirus-11-12-2020-11605125188?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewere down\u003c/a\u003e for the fourth straight week to 709,000, and unemployment fell to 6.9% in October—signs that workers are being called back or finding new roles. And Pfizer's big vaccine reveal (90% effectiveness in late-stage clinical trials) was a \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/pfizers-vaccine-is-a-pick-me-up-for-value-stocks-11605175592?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eboon for value stocks\u003c/a\u003e and industries hit hard by the pandemic, like travel.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBut first, we gotta deal with this\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNew cases and hospitalizations have risen in almost all 50 states, and Texas just became the first to pass 1 million confirmed cases.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eParts of the economy are steadily recovering, but as a growing number of state and local governments reimpose restrictions on business activity and social life, \"people may lose confidence that it is safe to go out,\" Powell said.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eYesterday, Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://abc7chicago.com/chicago-covid-coronavirus-mayor-lori-lightfoot-testing/7889268/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003easked\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e residents to go virtual this Thanksgiving and only venture out for essential needs. NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnewyork.com/news/coronavirus/new-restrictions-take-effect-in-nj-as-covid-19-cases-surge-cuomo-tightens-rules-in-ny/2718429/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e if the positivity rate reaches 3%, schools will go remote.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIn Europe, several governments have reinstituted lockdowns. Early data in Germany, France, Belgium, and Spain shows they're \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/nov/12/global-report-lockdowns-start-to-limit-covid-19-spread-in-europe?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ereducing transmission\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFlattening the curve is made even harder by widespread \u003ca href=\"https://www.gzeromedia.com/a-snapshot-of-covid-19-a-year-on?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epandemic fatigue\u003c/a\u003e. Many people are reluctant to go through lockdowns again and are relaxing health safeguards, GZERO Media writes. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eCan a vaccine fix things?  \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\"Certainly it's not going to be a pandemic for a lot longer, because I believe the vaccines are going to turn that around,\" Dr. Anthony Fauci said this week. In addition to Pfizer's big update, Moderna \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/11/12/coronavirus-moderna-vaccine-data-is-coming-in-days-what-to-look-out-for.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eis expected\u003c/a\u003e to post good news about its mRNA vaccine in the coming days. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut...it could still take weeks to get approval and months to manufacture and distribute it. And even longer to inoculate most of the population. In the meantime, health officials are stressing the continued need to wear masks and social distance.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" Fiber\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Home office\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis year's social distancing mandates have made employees much more familiar with each other's living rooms. But according to a poll shared exclusively with Morning Brew, they've also helped us turn our own lifestyle knobs to \"Healthy.\" \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eA Morning Brew/Harris poll conducted last weekend found that…\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTwo-thirds (67%) of remote workers say their lifestyle has gotten healthier since working from home. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAbout two in five remote workers (41%) say that since working from home, they've been eating healthier snacks throughout the day. About the same amount (38%) say they've been taking time to cook their meals. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003ePlus, U.S. remote workers are enjoying a more flexible routine. The top three things employed Americans said they'd miss about working remotely, if they had to return to an office, were: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSaving money by spending less on on gas and lunches each week (41%) \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eExtra time in the mornings (40%) \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBeing at home with their family (39%) \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eWhile convenient for those who can partake, remote work isn't available to everyone. Deutsche Bank Research released a report yesterday \u003ca href=\"https://www.bbc.com/news/business-54876526?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erecommending a tax\u003c/a\u003e on remote employers to support those who can't work from home.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eChipotle's first \"ghost kitchen,\" announced on Wednesday, \u003ca href=\"https://www.restaurantbusinessonline.com/operations/chipotle-rolls-out-its-first-ghost-kitchen?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eopens tomorrow\u003c/a\u003e in Highland Falls, NY. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat's a ghost kitchen? \u003c/strong\u003eA food prep location that \u003cem\u003eonly\u003c/em\u003e operates for delivery—no ordering on premises. Chipotle's version offers pickup as well. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHow it works:\u003c/strong\u003e Customers place orders on Chipotle's website, app, or a third-party delivery platform. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture: \u003c/strong\u003eCovid-19 has been devastating the restaurant biz. With the industry expected to lose $240 billion in sales by the end of 2020, pivoting to digital delivery and pickup with ghost kitchens could be a lifeboat for struggling chains. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIn Q3, Chipotle's digital sales soared over 200% yearly to $776 million. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAnother benefit of ghost kitchens? They give operators like Chipotle more flexibility to enter urban areas where full-size restaurants are tougher to squeeze in. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eas Covid cases in the U.S. climb past records, restaurants are
